name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Delbert Orr AFRICA, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Delbert Orr AFRICA, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgments of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Paul Diamond, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
437 A.2d 1161
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Delbert Orr AFRICA, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Oct. 19, 1981.
Decided Dec. 17. 1981.
Delbert Africa, in pro per.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Paul Diamond, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
